scripts.check:links: ! grep -r '](/' --include='*.mdx' . | grep -v 'https://' && echo '✅ No absolute Markdown links' || (echo '❌ ERROR: Found absolute Markdown links' && exit 1)
scripts.check:href: ! grep -r 'href="/' --include='*.mdx' . && echo '✅ No absolute JSX href' || (echo '❌ ERROR: Found absolute JSX href (use relative paths)' && exit 1)
scripts.check:all: npm run check:links && npm run check:href
